feed.title: Garage Sale
feed.subtitle: Selling stuff hat's been lying around forever...

entry.title: Items for Sale
entry.content:
We have had a lot of things lying around since our move from Gisenyi and Kibuye to Cyangugu. Here is a list with pictures. If you are interested, go to the bottom, fill in the contact form, and let us know what you’re interested in (the items are numbered). And please feel free to pass on this link

  1. Six Pairs of Shoes

More coming soon…
